\subsection*{Basic Instinct}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Rangi}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 0.75 mg & oral & Pharms - Triazolam & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 1 cig. & smoked & Tobacco - Cigarettes & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 70.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
T + 0:00  - oral 3 x .25mg



T + 1:10  - feeling quite tired, has relieved any DT's



T + 2:30  - Still feeling it, im notably slower than before. A nice doobie would go down pretty well about now.



T + 4:00  -Mild Effects still felt, felt a little clumsy before

might go lie down for a ciggie and some tv



Went to sleep after smoking a cig.
